attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that VAT rate should be zero rated or drastically reduced for babies moses baskets, cribs, cots and cot beds.
We are requesting the Prime Minister to make the reduction! We would appreciate help with this by signiture of the petition.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
